item.description:
So we know that you like being skeptical. But do you also like to socialize? Come on out to pub night and hang out with some like-minded, ethically-oriented, science-loving and dogma-debunking freethinkers.

BST can be a noisy venue -- if you have difficult hearing or being heard in a crowded pub environment, you might want to catch up with the gang at another event, where the background won't be so loud. Note too that this is more of a mixer, where we'll mostly be standing and moving around with our drinks, rather than a seated event.
item.name: September pub night
